Item.name: sc_Scorecard_Rollup
Item.sqlserver_body:
CREATE TRIGGER [sc_Scorecard_Rollup] ON [innovator].[sc_Scorecard_Location] FOR UPDATE AS /* This trigger checks updates the Totals on this Scorecard, and then rolls up all the scorecards for this Vendor and Period */
UPDATE sc_Scorecard_Location SET Total= pricing + delivery + responsiveness + scar_response + scar_ca_plan + scar_open + scar_incidents + qi_ppm + qi_audit_score + qi_scn
UPDATE [sc_Manufacturer_Scorecard] SET Score= (select avg(total) from sc_Scorecard_location where sc_Scorecard_location.source_id=sc_Manufacturer_Scorecard.id)
